Column.Name: Pending Submission
Column.Formula: OR( ARRAY_INDEXOF([Pending Submission Statuses], "Draft") > 0, ARRAY_INDEXOF([Pending Submission Statuses], "Submitted") > 0 )

Column.Name: Submission Data
Column.Formula: IF( AND( [Submission Data] = NULL, [Status] <> "Approved"), DB_LOOKUPALL( ARRAY("RecordID", "Status", "Round"), "Submission", "[LineNumber] = 1", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) ), [Submission Data] )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

Label.Text: Enter a reason for the exemption
Enter a reason for the exemption

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"

Approval is required for this exemption

"

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN '#900000'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN '#ffffff'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN '#ffff00'
ELSE '#efefef' END

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#b3b3b3'
WHEN [Status] = 'Approved' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved' THEN '#00a06d'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN 'black'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN 'black'
ELSE 'black' END

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula:
LET $submissionCount:= [Submission Count]; LET $lastSubmission:= IF( $submissionCount >0, DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Submission", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [Round] = "&DB_ENCODECONSTANT($submissionCount), HASH("parent", ARRAY([EFormType], [RecordID]) ) ), NULL );
RETURN ARRAY( "Exemption", "Exemption Approved", HASH("Status", "Approved"), HASH("Submission Count", $submissionCount, "Last Submission", $lastSubmission) )

Binding.Expression:
IF( [Status] = "Approved", "APPROVED",
[Pending Draft Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "PREPARING",
[Pending Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "IN PROGRESS",
[Submission Count] >=1, "Prepare Resubmission",
"Prepare Submission" )

LET $set := ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, [Submission Count]), $(i,item) HASH( "value", $item, "text", $item ) );
RETURN ARRAY_CONCAT( HASH("value", 0, "text", "All"), $set )

Label.Text: Enter a reference number for approvals that happened outside of the system

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE -- Check if user in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if the user is required to complete a COI on the Procurement WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members' THEN (STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE
END

CASE -- Check if user in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
--Check if the user is assigned to the Procurement record, or in the same department WHEN STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON ( [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) ) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if the user is required to complete a COI on the Procurement WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members' THEN (STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE
END

FieldEntry.Formula: HASH_GET( ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 4), "Submission Count" )//this will be 0 for the first round of submission +1
HASH_GET( ARRAY_INDEX($eventargs, 4), "Last Submission" ) //it will be null for the first roundof submission

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Call: Link Next Round (on last submission)
